PageTitle: mpls bgp bfd enable (MPLS-BGP-VPN instance view)
FuncDef:
The mpls bgp bfd enable command enables MPLS to dynamically create BGP BFD sessions.
The undo mpls bgp bfd enable command disables MPLS from dynamically creating BGP BFD sessions.
By default, MPLS is disabled from dynamically creating BGP BFD sessions.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
BFD for BGP tunnel rapidly detects faults in E2E BGP tunnels. Before a BGP BFD session is established, run the mpls bgp bfd enable command on the ingress of a BGP tunnel to enable MPLS to dynamically create BGP BFD sessions.
Prerequisites
BFD has been globally enabled using the bfd command.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the mpls bgp bfd-trigger-tunnel command to establish a BGP BFD session.
